## LogsGlobal.setUser() method

Set user information to all events, stored in `@usr`

See \<a href="https://docs.datadoghq.com/logs/log%5C_collection/javascript/#user-context" target="_blank" rel="noopener">User context\</a> for further information.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setUser(newUser: User & {
        id: string;
    }): void;
```
